statements: SELECT * FROM PatientScheduling;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM PatientScheduling WHERE doctor_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_type FROM PatientScheduling WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM PatientScheduling WHERE patient_id = '98765432-1234-5678-1234-567812345abc';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM PatientScheduling WHERE appointment_type = 'routine' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientScheduling WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM PatientScheduling ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(*) AS num_appointments FROM PatientScheduling GROUP BY doctor_id ORDER BY num_appointments DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT appointment_type FROM PatientScheduling;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, appointment_type FROM PatientScheduling WHERE doctor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_phone FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_type = 'Check-up' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT appointment_type, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-10-15' ORDER BY appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE p.patient_age < 40 AND a.appointment_type = 'Checkup';
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, description, status FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' AND last_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, last_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01' AND status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Patients INNER JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id WHERE Patients.last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT clinic_name FROM clinics ORDER BY clinic_id DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, dob FROM patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE doctor_name LIKE 'Dr%';
SELECT DISTINCT clinic_name, location FROM clinics ORDER BY location DESC;

SELECT appointments.appointment_id, patients.patient_name, appointments.appointment_date, doctors.specialization FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date > '2022-01-01' AND doctors.specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialization, doctor_department FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_phone FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id WHERE doctor_specialization = 'Cardiology';

SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialization, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;

SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_phone, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time DESC;
